description: Kemonomimi is a heavily community-focused project with a vision for a complete token, NFT, and P2E gaming utility on BSC. MIMI is a deflationary Token with automatic yield generation and will be used to mint NFTs. The Kemonomimi NFT Booster Pack utilizes Chainlink's VRF technology to generate a truly Random and unique NFT collectable. This is fully verifiable on the blockchain. There is no pre-minting or pre-determined outcomes. Even if The Team wants to participate the odds are the same. We believe this makes the gacha truly exciting and fair for all! Kemonomimi ($MIMI) was launched to bring a fun, interesting and immersive anime collectable ecosystem to the NFT and Cryptocurrency space. Kemonomimi is an anime and manga term that describes humanoid characters that possess animal like features, mainly a pair of ears and a tail. The appearance of the ears and the tail is based on the family of each Kemonomimi.
